tool_description: Maintains real-time inventory levels across all locations and provides current stock quantities with location-specific details.

location_id.description: Location identifier to track inventory for

item_sku.description: Specific item SKU to track (if not provided, tracks all items at location)

include_reserved.description: Whether to include reserved stock in available quantity

error_messages: Location not found: The specified location_id does not exist
Item not found: The specified item_sku does not exist at this location
Access denied: User does not have permission to view inventory at this location
usage: Provide location_id to get inventory levels. Optionally specify item_sku for a single item or set include_reserved to include reserved quantities in calculations.

location_id.description: The location identifier that was queried

total_items.description: Number of different items at this location

last_updated.description: Timestamp of last inventory update in ISO 8601 format

inventory_data.description: Array of inventory records in format 'SKU:Available:Reserved:Total'
